title: Show HN: QuickTunes: Apple Music player for Mac with iPod vibes
description: The slow and bloated nature of the Mac Apple Music app inspired us to create QuickTunes. It is a simple, fast, and native Apple Music player inspired by the simplicity of the iPod. You can use keyboard shortcuts to navigate a simple multi column layout, pick something, and press Play. Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=44697798 Points: 20 # Comments: 2
author: albertru90
excerpt: QuickTunes is a simple, lightweight, and fast Apple Music player for the Mac.
text: QuickTunes is a simple and fast Apple Music client for macOS. It aims to bring the simplicity of music players from the early 2000s like the iPod to your Mac. With QuickTunes, you can easily drill into your playlists, albums, artists, and songs, pick something, and press Play. Your browser does not support the video tag. The app is optimized to make navigating your music library a breeze with buttery smooth scrolling, keyboard navigation, and multi-touch gestures. The beautiful floating player makes it easy to control the currently-playing song, skip songs, shuffle, repeat, and more. Your browser does not support the video tag. As you resize the app's main window, the layout adapts dynamically, so whether you prefer a simple iPod-style layout or a multi-pane window, there's something for you. You can further customize the appearance of the app to suit your liking in the Settings window. If you want to quickly find a song, album, or playlist, just hit ⌘F to bring up a floating Spotlight-style search box. You can search either your local library or the Apple Music catalog. All Features Quickly explore your playlists, albums, artists, and songs Navigate the app with arrow keys and various keyboard shortcuts Enjoy buttery smooth scrolling and performance Explore different layouts by resizing the app's main window Relive the simplicity of the iPod with the compact layout Skip, shuffle, and repeat songs at will Sort, filter, and search your music library Manage your Up Next queue Customize the app's appearance to your liking Control the player using media keys or by right-clicking on the app's icon in the Dock Share the currently-playing song with your friends QuickTunes is compatible with macOS 15 "Sequoia" on Intel and Apple Silicon Macs.
html:
QuickTunes is a simple and fast Apple Music client for macOS. It aims to bring the simplicity of music players from the early 2000s like the iPod to your Mac. With QuickTunes, you can easily drill into your playlists, albums, artists, and songs, pick something, and press Play.

The app is optimized to make navigating your music library a breeze with buttery smooth scrolling, keyboard navigation, and multi-touch gestures. The beautiful floating player makes it easy to control the currently-playing song, skip songs, shuffle, repeat, and more.

As you resize the app's main window, the layout adapts dynamically, so whether you prefer a simple iPod-style layout or a multi-pane window, there's something for you. You can further customize the appearance of the app to suit your liking in the Settings window.

If you want to quickly find a song, album, or playlist, just hit ⌘F to bring up a floating Spotlight-style search box. You can search either your local library or the Apple Music catalog.

All Features

  • Quickly explore your playlists, albums, artists, and songs
  • Navigate the app with arrow keys and various keyboard shortcuts
  • Enjoy buttery smooth scrolling and performance
  • Explore different layouts by resizing the app's main window
  • Relive the simplicity of the iPod with the compact layout
  • Skip, shuffle, and repeat songs at will
  • Sort, filter, and search your music library
  • Manage your Up Next queue
  • Customize the app's appearance to your liking
  • Control the player using media keys or by right-clicking on the app's icon in the Dock
  • Share the currently-playing song with your friends

QuickTunes is compatible with macOS 15 "Sequoia" on Intel and Apple Silicon Macs.
